name: Riddle School 3
storyline: Riddle School 3 is the third in a series of school escaping, boring classroom avoiding, point and click adventure games! In Riddle School 3, your mission is to help Phil escape the classroom and eventually the school. Simple right? Not so fast! Several key objects that you need to escape are scattered about the school and finding them is no easy task. Will you be able to escape the school or will it be more homework for you?
summary: The biggest, hardest, and best Riddle School yet! This time, you escape the high school.
